title.en: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero

altTitles.en: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!

altTitles.es-la: Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder

altTitles.th: แกร่งเกินผู้กล้า แต่ซ่าไม่ได้

description.en:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

“I have erectile dysfunction.”
Woo Hyunsu ends up telling his classmate a secret he’s never told anyone while drunk.
Ha Jungyoon, Hyunsu’s new confidante, makes an unexpected suggestion.
“Sleep with me once. Who knows, I might get you hard.”

Will the dice of fate roll a 1 or a 6?
The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!
description.ja: 2206年ーー環境汚染や資源枯渇などにより、人の地球居住可能年数は残り100年と迫っていた。そんな中、人類存続を目的とし、世界人口を減らすため、滅亡させる国を選ぶ戦争『亡国決定戦』の開催が決まる！！ 各国の代表として戦うのは、人ならざる異能を持ち、最強と謳われし少年少女たち。

title.en: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~

altTitles.ja: 霜月さんはモブが好き～人見知りな彼女は俺にだけデレ甘い～

altTitles.en: Shimotsuki-san Likes the Mob: This Shy Girl is Only Sweet Towards Me

altTitles.vi: Shimotsuki-san chỉ thích nhân vật nền

altTitles.th: นิยาย ตัว (ไม่) ประกอบของคุณชิโมสึกิ เล่ม

altTitles.zh: 霜月同学喜欢上路人角色

altTitles.id: Shimotsuki-san Menyukai Mob ~Gadis Pemalu Ini Hanya Terlihat Manis di Hadapanku~

altTitles.en: She Is In Love with the Mob

altTitles.pl: Shimotsuki-san Lubi Postać Poboczną: Ta Nieśmiała Dziewczyna jest Urocza Tylko Wobec Mnie

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng Shimotsuki trót phải lòng nhân vật nền

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

altTitles.en: A Pen, Cuffs, & a De Fact-o Marriage
Pen, Cuffs, & a De Facto Marriage

altTitles.vi: Hôn thú giữa bút và còng tay

description.en: A middle-aged detective, Eiji Kirisame (40), meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word, but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However, suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!
description.ja: 中年刑事、切鮫鋭二(40)は、とある事件現場で声を出さない不思議な女子高生、梔子鶫に出会う。 事件の真相をド下手な絵で次々に明らかにしていく鶫に驚く切鮫だったが、突然、鶫から求婚されて―――？
description.vi: Kirisame Eiji, một cảnh sát luôn tận tâm với công việc quá mức đến nỗi không được lòng các đồng nghiệp của mình. Kuchinashi Tsugumi, một nữ sinh trung học kỳ lạ tuyệt chỉ giao tiếp bằng cây bút và quyển tập phác thảo của mình.Trong lúc Kirisame đang gặp bế tắc trong một vụ án mạng mà đồng nghiệp anh ai cũng cho rằng chỉ là một vụ tự sát, Tsugumi đã liên tiếp cho anh vô số lời gợi ý bằng những nét vẽ nguệch ngoạc của mình.Cuối vụ án, ngay vào lúc tính mạng của Tsugumi bị hung thủ đe doạ, Kirisame đã kịp thời cứu cô và bắt giữ tên tội phạm.Những tưởng mọi thứ đã xong Kirisame cảm thấy nhẹ nhõm, nhưng ngay sau đó, Tsugumi bất ngờ cầu hôn anh!?!?

altTitles.ja: 枠外 貯古、姻、後て守矢。
枠外 そぞろそそり
枠外 チョコの日、に

altTitles.ja-ro: Nu Na Tomo, Mo Yura Ni

description.en:
A long running series of Touhou doujinshi by the circle Ao.  
  
Covers and chapters ordered by release date as found on <https://thwiki.cc/青>

Exhausted mentally and physically, Song Liaoliao is ready to leave it all behind. She couldn't have anticipated that the new director is her old sweet- no, her old classmate. It should simply be a reunion of old friends, but Song Liaoliao unexpectedly finds herself gradually falling into Pei Yu's love trap...
description.zh: 甲方折磨到身心俱疲的宋了了只想就地出家，不想空降领导竟是她的老情——啊不，老同学。 原本只是旧友重逢，宋了了却怎么都没想到，自己竟一步一步陷入裴妤的爱情陷阱……

altTitles.ja: 犬飼さん家の押しかけJK

description.en: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!
description.ja: アラサー独身サラリーマンの犬飼はある日、こむぎと名乗る女子高生に出会う。こむぎは自身を犬飼の愛犬の生まれ変わりだと言い、毎日彼の家に通い詰める…！

altTitles.en: (太子さま復活祭) 恋色メガロマニア (東方Project)

description.en: A Hijiri x Miko doujin.

title.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Tsuki no Inaba to Chijou no Inaba

altTitles.en: Touhou - Inaba of the Moon & Inaba of the Earth

altTitles.ja: 東方儚月抄 ~月のイナバと地上の因幡

description.en:
A Cute and funny set of stories about two Rabbit Girl youkai - Reisen Udongein Inaba, Tewi Inaba and an Exiled Lunar Princess - Kaguya Houraisan along with Reisen's Master - Erin Yagokoto, and their everyday life in Eientei.  
  
- Reisen Udongein Inaba: A rabbit who abandoned her allies and fled from Moon. She looks up to Erin as her Master.  
- Tewi: An Earth rabbit who has lived a long time and has become a Yokai. She is supposed to bring good luck to anyone who meets her.  
- Kaguya Houraisan: A former Moon Princess who drank an elixir of Immortality and was banished for it. Now she is the Lady of Eientei.  
- Erin Yagokoro: A Pharmacist who lives in Eientei after fleeing from moon. Formerly in charge of Educating Kaguya.  
  
It counts as an official entry in the Touhou series, the third in the interconnected Touhou Bougetsushou storyline, albeit semi-canon due to its comedic gag-manga nature and ZUN being only a supervisor and not the sole author.

[Idle Nomad version]
Low-grade guide Qin Yun thought his assignment on Planet G would be uneventful—until he met Cezar, an eccentric esper with too much power and even more curiosity to spare. Left with a temporary mark, Qin Yun was stuck with being dragged across the galaxy, and dodging danger all while enduring Cezar’s unpredictable whims. This is only temporary, right?

[1Braincell version]
Low-grade guide, Qin Yun, forcibly marked by divine-grade sentry tyrant Mersherie, aggressive maiden-heart seme x serious straightforward uke starting an unbashful unabashed companion life, conquering the whole universe while at it

When Suguru, an ordinary high school student, comes home as usual, he bumps into his older sister's friend, Noriyuki! 

Deciding at first glance that the huge and rugged-looking Noriyuki is the type he doesn't like, Suguru leaves the house to escape from him, but for some reason Noriyuki starts to pester him persistently...!?
A lonely old painter and a girl with no friends. This is a story about two people who don't fit in, and how they learn how to love the world as it is.

altTitles.en: お姉ちゃんが死んだよ!

description.en: Satori is… dead? When Koishi breaks the news, her pets are understandably shaken. But what could have possibly sent her to her sleep?

title.en: Touhou - A Flower For The Heart. (Doujinshi)

description.en: Marisa have a match with Yuuka, but lost and starting to question herself. Yuuka come over in Marisa dream to cheer her up in a strange way.

altTitles.en: I Was Mistaken for the Villain

description.en: Haechan, who was too weak and ignored by everyone, meets the mysterious child Miro and gains great strength, but at the same time, he learns that the sealing stone that he thought would protect everyone was actually the main culprit that was destroying the world. He tries to fix this on his own, but those who do not know the truth see him as a villain.

The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
description.ja:
真の救済が記されてるという経典を得るため、孫悟空・猪八戒・沙悟浄を共にし、天竺を目指す三蔵法師。

その道のりで襲いかかる試練が
・・・・・・・・全部エロい。

仏の道に生きる三蔵にとっては貞操を失うこと、それ即ち死。果たして三蔵法師は煩悩に打ち克ち、貞操を守り抜けるのか？

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

altTitles.ja-ro: Touhou dj - Aru Ai no Mahou

description.en: A short story about Marisa visiting Alice home. MarixAli.

title.en: Dominating the Cultivation Realm with Muscles

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Yong Jirou Chengba Xiu Xianjie
Wǒ Yòng Jīròu Chēngbà Xiū Xiānjiè

altTitles.en: I Use My Muscles to Dominate the World of Cultivating Immortals

altTitles.pt-br: Dominei o Mundo de Cultivação na Porrada

description.en: Astonishing! A top-tier powerhouse defeated by a set of radio calisthenics! In “Today’s Immortal News,” witness a tale where a man punches his way through luck-favored experts, kicks against powerful cultivators, all without spiritual roots or the ability to manipulate spiritual energy. Yet, he defies all odds, using his sheer MUSCLES to ascend the heights of cultivation and reach the pinnacle of immortality.
description.zh: 震惊！顶级大佬竟被一套广播体操打败！——《今日仙闻》 拳打气运强者，脚踢修仙大能，没有灵根，无法运用灵气，却靠一身肌肉踏上修仙巅峰。
description.pt-br: Surpreendente! Uma potência de alto nível derrotada por um conjunto de calistenia de rádio! Em “Notícias Imortais de Hoje”, testemunhe uma história onde um homem abre caminho entre especialistas favorecidos pela sorte, confronta cultivadores poderosos, tudo isso sem raízes espirituais ou a capacidade de manipular energia espiritual. No entanto, ele desafia todas as probabilidades, usando apenas seus MÚSCULOS para ascender às alturas da cultivação e alcançar o pico da imortalidade.

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.
description.ja: 無人島に上陸した、廃墟研究サークルの大学生たちを襲う白昼の恐怖!! 殺人鬼に拉致された仲間の救出に向かう一行を待ち受ける過酷な罠!! 地図から消された“禁断の島”に隠された闇が、若者たちの心を蝕んでいく…。

title.en: Akujo ga Kishi no Kyouai Kara Nogareru Houhou

altTitles.ja: 悪女が騎士の狂愛から逃れる方法

altTitles.en: How Can I Escape from This Knight's Crazy Love?!

description.en:
“A fate where you’re destined to be killed by an obsessive knight…!!”

The protagonist finds herself reincarnated as Victoria, the villainess in a romance novel.
Victoria’s inevitable fate is to be killed by her loyal knight, Cain.
Under the influence of a charm spell, Cain loves her blindly, and eventually, that love spirals out of control.
On top of that, if Cain discovers that the real Victoria’s soul has been replaced by someone else, things will definitely not end well…!
To avoid this deadly future, Victoria decides to break the charm spell while pretending to be the villainess.
However, Cain’s gaze, which initially felt terrifying, gradually becomes sweeter and more affectionate…!!
Alice x Reimu

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.en: I Robbed the Storehouse of the God

description.en:
The Tower’s peace was shattered by the Outer invaders and the Great War of Gods and Demons, leading to the extinction of humanity. In the midst of it all, the only survivor, ‘Jeong Sewoon,’ embarks on a mission to undo everything. He discovers the Demon’s Vault, created by the Demon of Greed, within the depths of the Demonic War.

Inside the vault, he finds the Hourglass of Chronos, capable of turning back time!
‘If I go back to the past, stop the Great War, ascend the Tower, and personally fend off the Outers…!’

This time, I won’t let the world fall to ruin. With the powers I took from the Demon’s Vault!
Follow Jeong Sewoon’s expedition through the Tower as he starts again from the tutorial!

Yukari was picked up by Kyuubi, when she was just a little child. After an amount of time they spend together, she made a terrible mistake by killing her mentors long desired prey.  
  
Kyuubi, who's only reason to live is to search for the strongest enemy, was greatly disappointed and left her.  
  
In the following hundreds of years, Yukari grows into the ultimate opponent to finally face on Kyuubi… and to make her stay with her forever.

I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...
description.vi: Yuji Kamome, một nhà báo tự do đã mất đi đứa con gái yêu quý của mình trong một vụ tai nạn. Trong cơn tuyệt vọng, vợ anh cũng đã rời bỏ anh, để mặc anh trải qua những tháng ngày trống rỗng. Tuy nhiên, một ngày nọ, một tờ rơi từ một giáo phái kỳ lạ mang tên "Tâm Tiếu Hội" tìm đến và thay đổi số phận của anh. Và trong bức ảnh trên tờ rơi đó anh đã nhận ra được người vợ đã biệt tăm biệt tích suốt thời gian qua của mình. Một câu chuyện về sự cuồng tín và điên rồ của con người. Thứ bóng tối tà đạo mà nụ cười ma quái đó đang mời gọi là gì?

description.en: Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!

altTitles.en: Touhou dj - Dora Neko Otome Taimu

description.en: Ran just acquired a new shikigami, Chen.
A boy has become a magical girl, Kazana Kakeru is going to become more feminine to get stronger…
description.ru: Мальчик стал волшебницей! Кадзана Какэру станет женственнее, чтобы стать сильнее…
description.pt-br: Um garoto que se transformou em uma garota mágica, Kazana Kakeru vai ficar mais feminina para se tornar mais forte...

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Learn Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhēn Bù Xiǎng Xué Jìn Zhòu
Wo Zhen Bu Xiang Xue Jin Zhou

description.en:
For Ning Feng, an infamous underachiever, this will be his third time taking the awakening exam.  When he awakens as a one-star -- the lowest possible rating -- everyone laughs.  He can't understand why his new skills talk about "forbidden spells" and "dark power."  
He isn't an evil dark lord, but wow!  Who knew forbidden spells could be so powerful!  These skills are so cool, but they emit tons of dark power. 
There's a new source of dark power in the city and Ning Feng must get stronger before anyone realizes that its him.

altTitles.ja: てんで性悪キューピッド

description.en: The Koinobori yakuza family's souls are expensive commodoties, a source of great pride to those of the demon world's soul bank. But when the Koinobori heir, Ryuji, is born with a pure soul engrossed with fairies and angels, it's up to Maria to become his personal cupid and reform him so that he continues the Koinobori's lascivious family line!

altTitles.en: Touhou dj - Orin chan and Satori sama
おりんちゃんとさとりさま

description.en: One day Satori took a little abandoned kitty home. And so the Earth Spirits Palace became ♡% more adorable.
description.pt: Satori encontra uma pequena gata youkai abandonada na floresta, ela resolve levá-la para o palácio e adotar como pet de estimação.

description.en: The long awaited new series from Shima Tokio, an irregular boy meets girl story. Please enjoy this extraordinarily sweet romantic comedy.
A retelling of UFO from Sanae's view.

title.en: The Carefree Life of an SSS-Class Knight

altTitles.ko: SSS급 특성을 받았지만 적당히 살고 싶다

altTitles.ko-ro: SSSGeup Teukseongeul Badatjiman Jeokdanghi Salgo Sipda

altTitles.ru: Получил характеристики уровня SSS, но хочу жить в меру

altTitles.en: I have an SSS-rank Trait, but I want a Normal Life

description.en:
Even though strange beings like monsters and constellations appeared, my personal philosophy did not change.
But with the sudden awakening and blessing of an SSS-rank trait, my peaceful life went bye-bye.
I have no choice but to level up if I want to protect myself now!
description.ko:
어느 날 세상에 몬스터가 나타나고,
성좌니 하는 기묘한 존재들이 등장했어도,
내가 찾은 진리는 변하지 않았다.

갑작스러운 SSS급 특성과 각성 그리고 물건너간 평화.

“사악한 악마들이여, 오늘이 너희의 마지막 날이다.
기사도와 이 깃발의 이름 아래 정의가 실현되리라!”

altTitles.vi: Đôi Mèo Song Hành - Maruru và Hachi

altTitles.ja: ツレ猫　マルルとハチ

description.en: House cat Maruru is in a bad situation: after chasing after crows he cannot find his way back home. Thus start his life as a stray cat, partnering up with fellow stray Hachiware.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện kể về "Maruru và Hachi", những chú mèo đã trở thành mèo hoang sau khi rời bỏ chủ nhân vì vài lí do.

Vì vài lí do nào đó, Maruru đã rời bỏ chủ nhân và trở thành mèo hoang. Rồi gặp được Hachi, một chú mèo đực khác với quả mắt chán đời (?), và cả hai bắt đầu đi dạo cùng nhau -- song đời thì lại không đơn giản đến thế. Đây là câu chuyện kể về những chú mèo hoang (và những con người xung quanh chúng) sống sót trong thế giới khắc nghiệt này. Một bộ truyện kể về chú mèo hài hước và dễ thương song hành cùng một chú mèo khó tính!
description.pt-br: O gato doméstico Maruru está em uma situação complicada: depois de perseguir corvos, ele não consegue encontrar o caminho de volta para casa. Assim, comece sua vida como um gato de rua, fazendo parceria com o colega de rua Hachiware.

title.en: My Female Disciples are all Future Masters of the Heavens

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Shots From the Future

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ De Nǚ Túdìmen Dōu Shì Wèilái Zhū Tiān Dà Lǎo

altTitles.zh: 我的女徒弟们都是未来诸天大佬

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Nü Tudi Men Dou Shi Weilai Zhu Tian Dalao

altTitles.zh-hk: 諸天聖者〜崩壊世界と女弟子〜

altTitles.tr: Kadın Çıraklarımın Hepsi Gelecekteki Büyük Tanrılar

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Ss From the Future

altTitles.vi: Các Nữ Đồ Đệ Của Ta Đều Là Chư Thiên Đại Lão Tương Lai

altTitles.es-la: Mis discípulas son las futuros grandezas de los cielos

description.en:
The historical timeline is facing collapse, and the strongest Taoist master was sent back to one hundred thousand years ago with his entire body of cultivation. Ding~ Your system-assigned mission is here, it's up to you to entice all the female apprentices!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13619)
- [Official japanese (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82263)
description.tr: Tarihin uzun nehri çöküşle karşı karşıya, en güçlü Taoist rahip yüz bin yıl önceye geri döndü. Ding ~ Sistem görev verdi ve gelecekteki tanrıları çırağınız yapın!
description.zh: 历史长河面临崩溃，最强道尊带着一身修为回到十万年前？叮~您的系统任务到了，收服女徒弟的任务就交给你了！

altTitles.ja: こころすまいるプライスレス

description.en: One of Kokoro’s mask ended up in Kourindou, and to get it back she will have to work for Rinnosuke. But don’t worry, Koishi is here to help.
description.pt: Depois de achar a Máscara na loja Kourindou, Kokoro pede para devolver, mas para isso ela terá que trabalhar para Rinnosuke vendendo objetos junto com ajuda da Koishi.

description.en: This horror anthology presents a collection of eerie ghost stories based on real-life accounts gathered over two decades by the renowned storyteller Yama Yuu. Adapted by Hokamoto Kensei, the manga explores the unsettling facets of human nature and madness, as a mysterious young girl narrates the tales within a secluded room. The stories promise a dark, chilling atmosphere that immerses readers in an eerie journey into the supernatural.
description.vi:
Một bộ truyện về những câu chuyện kinh dị của tác giả Yama Yu, một nhà văn chuyên viết truyện ma của Nhật Bản được minh họa bởi Hokamoto Kensei.
Những câu chuyện kinh dị của Yama Yu tiên sinh đi sâu vào chủ nghĩa hiện thực và sự điên rồ của con người dựa trên những câu chuyện ma có thật được thu thập từ khắp Nhật Bản suốt hơn 20 năm.
Và với ngòi bút của họa sĩ Hokamoto Kensei, những câu chuyện méo mó về thứ bóng tối nằm sâu trong trái tim con người sẽ được lột tả một cách chân thực hơn bao giờ hết trong tác phẩm Yếm Đàm Dạ Thoại này.

title.en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Tai no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.vi: Con quái vật trong tử cung của tôi

description.en:
***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

description.en: Unable to accept the death of his best friend Octo-chan, Yota makes a forbidden wish on a night of despair. What appeared before his eyes was...? The genius Ichinohe-sensei debuts with an impactful serialization! A new sensational fantasy tale of everlasting friendship!!

title.en: I Got The Weakest Class, Dragon Tamer!?

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：驭龙师是最弱职业？

altTitles.zh-ro: Quánmín Zhuǎn Zhí: Yù Lóng Shī Shì Zuì Ruò Zhíyè?

description.en: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

Mob Psycho 100 is the story about a young middle schooler, Shigeo Kageyama, nicknamed "Mob" living in Seasoning City. Ever since he was young, he has had astounding psychic powers. However, this esper power is unable to grant him the one thing he wishes for the most: to be friends with the girl he likes in his class.
description.ja:
何かが「100」になったとき、爆発する少年モブ。
外見はいたって普通ーというよりむしろ地味。場の空気を読むのが苦手な彼は、実は強力な超能力の持ち主だった。
そんな彼の能力に目をつけ、次々と現れるニセ霊能力者に宗教団体、不良番長、謎の秘密組織・・・。
フツーの青春を願うモブに、平穏な日は訪れるのか？
description.ru: Кагэяма Сигэо, также известный как «Моб», восьмиклассник с психическими способностями. Он мог сгибать ложки и поднимать вещи силой мысли с ранних лет, но затем стал постепенно сдерживаться от использования способностей на публике. Теперь, единственное, чего он хочет — подружиться с девочкой из класса, Цубоми. Вместе со своим психическим «наставником», он продолжает повседневную жизнь, пытаясь понять свое назначение в жизни.
description.pt-br: Kageyama Shigeo (ou "Mob") é um estudante do 8º ano com habilidades psíquicas. Desde pequeno, ele é capaz de entortar colheres e fazer objetos levitarem usando sua mente, mas, aos poucos, passou a evitar usar suas habilidades em público devido à atenção negativa que recebia. Agora, a única coisa que ele quer é se tornar amigo de uma garota de sua classe, Tsubomi. Junto com seu "mentor psíquico" (que não tem poderes psíquicos), ele continua sua vida cotidiana, tentando realizar seu objetivo de vida.

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

altTitles.en: Ambivalent: A World Where Losing Your Virginity Means Death

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？
